item.title: Building Developer Communities
item.description: Note: The below is not an official communication of the City of Philadelphia, all opinions are my own While we can all agree that engineers hate meetings, we all also know that we work better when we’re part of a community. Most engineers want to have colleagues that give thoughtful code reviews, want to participate in a collaborative software design process, and feel supported. Nobody likes the feeling of being the only one that can solve an issue - and more practically, being on call all of the time.
